verses.verse: When<WH3588> Israel<WH3478> [was] a youth<WH5288> I loved<WH157> him, And out of Egypt<WH4714> I called<WH7121> My son.<WH1121>
The more they called<WH7121> them, The more<WH3651> they went<WH1980> from them; They kept sacrificing<WH2076> to the Baals<WH1168> And burning<WH6999> incense<WH6999> to idols.<WH6456>
Yet it is I who taught<WH7270> Ephraim<WH669> to walk,<WH7270> I took<WH3947> them in My arms;<WH2220> But they did not know<WH3045> that I healed<WH7495> them.

I led<WH4900> them with cords<WH9112> of a man,<WH120> with bonds<WH5688> of love,<WH160> And I became<WH1961> to them as one who lifts<WH7311> the yoke<WH5923> from their jaws;<WH3895> And I bent<WH5186> down<WH5186> [and] fed<WH398> them.
They will not return<WH7725> to the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714> But Assyria<WH804> â€“ he will be their king,<WH4428> Because<WH3588> they refused<WH3985> to return<WH7725> [to Me.]
And the sword<WH2719> will whirl<WH9123> against their cities,<WH5892> And will demolish<WH3615> their gate bars<WH905> And consume<WH3615> [them] because<WH4480> of their counsels.<WH4156>
So My people<WH5971> are bent<WH8511> on turning<WH4878> from Me. Though they call<WH7121> them to [the One] on high,<WH5920> None<WH3808> at all<WH3162> exalts<WH7311> [Him.]

How<WH349> can I give<WH5414> you up, O Ephraim<WH669>? How can I surrender<WH4042> you, O Israel<WH3478>? How<WH349> can I make<WH5414> you like Admah<WH126>? How can I treat<WH7760> you like Zeboiim<WH6636>? My heart<WH3820> is turned<WH2015> over<WH2015> within<WH5921> Me, All<WH3162> My compassions<WH5150> are kindled.<WH3648>

I will not execute<WH6213> My fierce<WH2740> anger;<WH639> I will not destroy<WH7843> Ephraim<WH669> again.<WH7725> For I am God<WH410> and not man,<WH376> the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> in your midst,<WH7130> And I will not come<WH935> in wrath.<WH9409>

They will walk<WH1980> after<WH310> the Lord,<WH3068> He will roar<WH7580> like a lion;<WH9030> Indeed<WH3588> He will roar,<WH7580> And [His] sons<WH1121> will come<WH2729> trembling<WH2729> from the west.<WH3220>

They will come<WH2729> trembling<WH2729> like birds<WH6833> from Egypt,<WH4714> And like doves<WH3123> from the land<WH776> of Assyria;<WH804> And I will settle<WH3427> them in their houses,<WH1004> declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

Ephraim<WH669> surrounds<WH5437> Me with lies,<WH3585> And the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> with deceit;<WH4820> Judah<WH3063> is also<WH5750> unruly<WH7300> against<WH5973> God,<WH410> Even against<WH5973> the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> who is faithful.<WH539>
